meanings.definition: The birds of a particular region, habitat, or geological period.
meanings.sent1: The avifaunae in this forest include colorful parrots and chirping sparrows.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the avifaunae of different islands to understand their ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The avifaunae of the park organized a singing competition.
meanings.sent4: The avifaunae of the city filled the sky with a symphony of melodies.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the avifaunae of the desert revealed a surprising variety of species.

meanings.definition: The bird life of a region.
meanings.sent1: The avifaunae of the wetlands attract birdwatchers from far and wide.
meanings.sent2: Local conservation efforts aim to protect the avifaunae of the coastal areas.
meanings.sent3: The avifaunae of the neighborhood woke everyone up with their morning songs.
meanings.sent4: The avifaunae of the mountains soared gracefully against the blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The avifaunae of the park created a beautiful natural soundtrack for visitors.
